comments:
Build ID: M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:
1. EXECUTE: Start Eclipse from all-in-one WTP 2.0.1 distribution 
2. EXECUTE:Invoke New Dynamic Web Project wizard
3. EXECUTE:Select Java Server Faces v1.1 Project in configurations combo
4.ASSERT:  Names cannot be empty. message appears in dialog title
5. EXECUTE:Then select Java Server Faces v1.1 Project in configuration combo
6. ASSERT: Message remains the same

Now it throws NullPointerException exception during step 6 and shows an empty error message.



More information:
